entry.summary: Re Arbitrum 与加密分析公司 Nansen 合作，在 2 月份对用户活动进行“快照”，以确定谁应该有资格获得 ARB 代币。根据 Goldfeder 的说法，“您进行了多少次交易，使用了多少种不同的应用程序，以及使用了多长时间”，Arbitrum One 和 Arbitrum Nitro 是用于确定资格的因素之一。

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，欧洲议会以 418 票赞成 103 票反对和 24 票弃权的结果通过数字身份框架提案，将允许公民通过欧洲数字身份钱包识别和验证自己。提案包括保护用户隐私的零知识证明技术（ZK-proof ），议会准备与理事会就欧盟范围内的数字钱包进行谈判。 https://www.europarl.europa.eu/news/en/press-room/20230315IPR77508/parliament-ready-to-negotiate-with-council-for-an-eu-wide-digital-wallet

entry.title: It’s amazing how much was made of the $USDC depeg.

It’s amazing how much was made of the $USDC depeg.

Jeremy Allaire: Indeed, the Payment Stablecoin Act, which remains a very active pursuit for Congress, would enshrine in law a regime where stabelcoin funds would be held with cash at the Fed and short-term T-Bills. We need this law now more than ever if we want a truly safe financial system.

entry.title: RT Haseeb ＞|＜: Just read through the SEC case against Do Kwon/Terraform Labs so you don't have to. https://www.docdroid.net/xC1daxt/kwonzi-scheme-pd...
entry.summary: RT Haseeb ＞|＜ Just read through the SEC case against Do Kwon/Terraform Labs so you don't have to. https://www.docdroid.net/xC1daxt/kwonzi-scheme-pdf#page=54 A few takeaways:
